metadata.title: Complete Genome Sequences of Two Genetically Distinct Variants of Porcine Epidemic Diarrhea Virus in the Eastern Region of Thailand

abstract.original_text: Thailand was a new variant containing an insertion and deletion in the spike gene. Herein, full-length genome sequences are reported for two variants of PEDV isolates from pigs displaying diarrhea in Thailand.

sentences.segment_text: Thailand was a new variant containing an insertion and deletion in the spike gene .
Herein , full-length genome sequences are reported for two variants of PEDV isolates from pigs displaying diarrhea in Thailand .
